fields.label: Date
fields.name: date
fields.instructions: Compare with PA UCR data. Default to UCR PA data.

fields.label: Victims PA UCR
fields.name: victims_pa_ucr
fields.instructions: From PA UCR data. Number of victims.

fields.label: Victim Age
fields.name: victim_age
fields.instructions: Compare with PA UCR data. Default to PA UCR data.

fields.label: Offenders PA UCR
fields.name: offenders_pa_ucr
fields.instructions: From PA UCR data. Number of offenders.

fields.label: Relationship Type PA UCR
fields.name: relationship_type_pa_ucr
fields.instructions: Victim Relationship to Offender from PA UCR data.

fields.label: Death Circumstance PA UCR
fields.name: death_circumstance_pa_ucr
fields.instructions: Death Circumstance from PA UCR data.

choices.Brawl Due to Influence of Alcohol: Brawl Due to Influence of Alcohol
choices.Other Manslaughter by Neg. Except Traffi: Other Manslaughter by Neg. Except Traffic
choices.Other neg. Handling of Gun Results in De: Other neg. Handling of Gun Results in Death

fields.label: Justified PA UCR
fields.name: justified_pa_ucr
fields.instructions: Whether the killing was justified. Default = unjustified. From PA UCR data.

choices.Killed in Commission of a Crime: Killed in Commission of a Crime
choices.Criminal Attacked Police Officer and Tha: Criminal Attacked Police Officer and That Officer Killed Criminal
choices.Crim. Attacked Police Off. and Crim. Kil: Crim. Attacked Police Off. and Crim. Killed by Another Off.

fields.label: Data Entry
fields.name: data_entry
fields.instructions: Name of person entering data for this case.

fields.label: Data Cleanup
fields.name: data_cleanup
fields.instructions: Name of person who has double checked the entry during data cleanup.

fields.label: Source
fields.name: source
fields.instructions: News source from which data is derived.

fields.label: Missing Data
fields.name: missing_data
fields.instructions: Please choose if data cannot be matched with primary source(s).

fields.label: Citation
fields.name: citation
fields.instructions: Use ASA format. A format guide is available at http://bit.ly/2DmMDEn  The newspaper citation format will almost always be the appropriate one to use. You can enter multiple citations within this field. Enter spaces between the entries.
